channel.title: Lock please, problem solved! :D
channel.description:
[s]Join a server through Hamachi? I mean, I understand you have to put the network name and password into Hamachi via "Join Existing Network" but how do you get onto the server? When I try to join Hamachi servers, it always gives me that gay "Error connecting to server" message...
Can someone explain Hamachi to me? :([/s]
Could a Mod lock this for me please? Thanks!
~^!^~Odimaru~^!^~
